name: Pandémonium
description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ - THIS GAME IS IN FRENCH - /!\ WARNING /!\

Pandémonium is a strategy / management game in 3d view of ¾. Our game takes on the opposite of the tower defense principle, instead of playing the defender, we play the attacker with the objective of destroying the building found at the end of the level. 

Controls 

Mouse (almost every thing)

Alt : show range of towers

Esc : Pause menu
